name: Loophole: Abstract adventure
description:
In this adventure game, you have to go through several chapters with challenging and interesting levels along the way. You control a ball that flies strictly in orbit, all you can do is change the direction of movement or double the speed. Try to pass incredibly difficult levels with these simple controls.

SIMPLE AND UNIQUE CONTROL

The gameplay is thought out specifically to make this game convenient to play on the phone, you only need one hand and a sharp reaction: make a touch to change the direction of the particle. Press and hold to double the particle speed.

ABSTRACT DESIGN

Beauty is in simplicity. The game is created in an abstract design and captivates with its simplicity of lines.

SEVERAL CHAPTERS

The adventure consists of three chapters with unique levels, each level differs from the other in its set of obstacles, speed, and rhythm. In the future, the number of chapters will increase and the levels will become more difficult :)

THE PERFECTIONIST'S WAY

Each of the levels can be completed in the optimal number of actions, the number of actions that is considered optimal for a given level is indicated in the upper left corner during the game, try to go through each of the levels along the reference path.

SURVIVAL MODE

The game has a survival mode or an endless game mode, where you will play as long as you can hold out!

BEAUTIFUL ELECTRONIC MUSIC

Music specially selected for full immersion in the game. Quiet but persistent ambient will help you get into the rhythm of the game and get real pleasure from the process.

The game is under development. Feel free to post your ideas and review of the gaming experience. Thank!

Try to complete the abstract adventure!
